archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.4.3c: c) restrict access to particular areas of storage (e.g. by implementing zoning which allocates logical partitions on disks to particular servers, or by masking which restricts access to areas of hard disk drives to authorised servers) to prevent unauthorised or unauthenticated access
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
